name: Counterclockwise 逆时针
description:
2D Pixel Puzzle Game made by a group of undergrad students from UCSC.

Here is the website for this game: 

https://sites.google.com/ucsc.edu/counterclockwise/home

Please comment below if encountered any bugs or error during gameplay!

Note: If you click on the calendar and it shows a huge white blank, please change the language in the setting for a few times to let it load. We will hopefully be fixing this bug in future updates.
